DOC.detailed_description: Sleep fragmentation one main problem sleep disorder especially respiratory failure . During last decade , several indicator sleep fragmentation introduce none seem take account succession sleep stage . To tackle problem , The investigator use Shannon entropy index model sleep stage diversity hypnogram assess accurately sleep quality quantify fragmentation . The investigator develop new tool call Sleep Diversity Index ( SDI ) . In retrospective study , investigator calculate Sleep diversity index 55 healthy subject 56 patient suspected sleep apnea syndrom . Using receiver operate characteristic ( ROC ) curve threshold fragmentation determine 20 % . If SDI lower 20 % , sleep consider non-fragmented otherwise , sleep consider fragmented . To validate SDI necessary compare diagnosis tool `` gold standard '' base clinician diagnosis mathematical diagnosis index create objective criterion polysomnography . The investigator propose multicenter study validate SDI diagnosis tool sleep fragmentation .
